The “Belle de Navy Membership Club” is a rewards program set up to give our Customers as much value as possible through their shopping experience.

When you join our club, you gain the following:

​1. Points for shopping

​With every UGX 4000 spent, you earn 1 point. Each point is worth 100/=, which you can either redeem when placing your next order, or leave to accumulate till you’re ready for your discount.

2. Unlimited access to exclusive Discounts, Promo Codes and Flash Sales.

3.Birthday Offers

4. Free Returns on orders over 100,00/=

​Not a member yet? Click here to Sign Up for free.
